attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want England to be recognised in the same way that Ireland and Wales are even Scotland is recognised. England has disappeared at the stroke of a pen by bureaucrats that we do not want, we should be able to call ourselves Englishmen once again. we want to be regognised on census forms and any other forms where nationality is asked. I am English and proud of it not British but ENGLISH not Irish Welsh or European so give us our recognition

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
